name: Momento - Mori
description: Momento Mori is a short narrative experience revolving around topics of death and we take things for granted. You are given the roll of knocking door-to-door on a religious quest only to be shot down. This game only takes a few minutes to complete, but it uses it's time effectively as it builds a narrative around you. The art style is inspired multiple games, but keeps a strong PS1 theme.
